Pick fruit Tips

Pick fruit has a secret, no matter what the fruit, the site of the pedicle of the concave more powerful the more sweet, to pick the fruit of medium size, very much hormone, leavening agent, a reminder of what the. In short, too much is best not to buy, either fruit or river crabs, fish and shrimp!
Oranges to be high-ceilinged body, tangerine, orange leather flat light. Pick oranges, regardless of species, a ring in the middle of the mother of the usually rather sweet, there is a point-like male mother sweet pick thin flexible, as early as the orange juice and sweet late orange rough stringy. Grapefruit, tangerines, oranges to pick Shen hands, skin picking lubrication like a baby's skin, rough like a pockmarked face, do not buy, but winter popular sugar orange skin is very rough, smooth, not good.
The best time to buy oranges buy at the bottom, "ass" above a circle. Navel oranges, bought the "ass" That hole is concave rather sweet. Grapefruit, pomelo is generally more tight as possible. The hand weigh feels The heavier the better of the same size. By hand, the harder the better, the press does not go on the thin skin, the skin thinner the better. Pomelo skin more smooth, more uniform color, the better the more partial golden. Grapefruit pulp moisture is adequate, sweetness, taste some.

Pick fruit Tips III

Durian pick concentrated flavor, slightly cracked a little, see the flesh inside soft waxy waxy, and never wet, relatively slender, golden flesh, fuller fruit shape shell thinner flap of flesh will be more. Kind of oblong shell thick, flesh thin. Selection shell yellow with green as well.<br>To choose when the election litchi uneven epidermidis, deep lines of the kind of the kind of litchi are usually small core! Kind of smooth surface, generally nuclear are great! Only to surface ruddy, but pinch up full flexible, no elasticity very soft feeling a bit empty is to put the long time. Can also gently lychee tail, if you feel soft, not to hard objects, in general nuclear is relatively small, it can feel to a hard object, usually a large nuclear. <br>
Pears to pick the mother, delicate, juicy and sweet. Mother, is the top of the nest to choose double number, umbilical deep periumbilical round, the thick root. Peaches first and foremost is chosen inhale their fragrance, more more sweet incense, usually appearance not look good, the pick too soft, with a small pointy.

Pick fruit Tips 4

Grapes to pick the whole string full of cob looks kind of thick, smell the aroma, fragrant fruit before buying. If winter pick grapes, do buy fresh. Do not look at the berry depends on stems, fresh grapes, stems stiff, bright green. When the color dark brown, soft pops, is off to a relatively long time, the grapes may berry looks relatively quite real, but are in fact the result of cryopreservation, not really fresh. Buy "Rose incense" grapes in particular, note that such a small grain of fruit is not easy to save.<br>Bananas do not pick two green, it is processed, and the height is not too big, smaller bananas we go to round, do not have is a good angular banana, normal yellow slightly sesame points.<br>Election kiwifruit must choose the head sharp, like chicks mouth, and not to vote is flat like a duck mouth kind. Kind of duck mouth with a hormone, chicken mouth is never used hormone or little use of hormone. Truly cooked whole kiwi fruit are super soft selection, buy the kind of slightly deeper color, and is close to khaki jacket, which is the symbol of the abundant sunshine, also sweeter.

Tips 5 pick fruit

Pick watermelon, melon pattern to pick feels like a distraction, like tail flowering shut small "belly button" the concave feels melon surface is not smooth, but uneven, melon color. deep green Ze hold up with one hand, gently tapping, listening to the sound, you should feel a little empty, resting his hand to feel a slight vibration, the watermelon is sand flesh, which is not close. If not familiar, the sound is very dead.<br> Selection of white melon should elect melon is relatively small, the the melon the bulk of the part no navel, but a little green, this is a first leaf node melon better pick because the length of the small. There is to pick umbilical, umbilical larger the better, according to the part of the umbilical softer. And smell the cantaloupe ass, good flavor is sweet melon.<br> To pick cantaloupe to pick coarse textured and dense doctrinal aroma smell, buy any melon, and Guayang not linked to the other end is concave is cooked, well, sweet.

From a teaching career

Gucci Outlet Online StoreAs a teacher, a lot of people out of the podium as a goal, but once really left, and there will be too much nostalgia and fond memories. Call you basically that word - teacher in a school, regardless of leadership colleagues or students. However, leadership and colleagues call you in front preceded by your last name, in order to distinguish between the people who are engaged in teaching, and students call you the vast majority is courtesy because you are a faculty member of the school, only a small part, is you teach students is really think that you are a teacher by their prophecy, soon as the teacher contains too many feelings, that is your bodyguard!
Louis Vuitton OutletI remember that year, just the podium, ushered in a dozen eight-year-old youngster children, first grade! Let my 22-year-old just out of college, it seems there is the size of the passion Huoer to teach, and for a time it is a bit sense of loss. The reason is not a student is too small, but the bad conditions. Year are catching up with the school building, students are dispersed to farmers at home. The beginning of the village to our class assigned to a particularly poor families, they have four rooms, two live, an outhouse, that is, to do the kitchen, another stacked debris. I have looked at the house of the classroom that is going to do, the door basically does not close, windows the curtain made ??of sorghum lever, blocked off, then Wong Nai cast house is only from the door in through that little light squeeze from mud cracks in window streaks of daylight, but added it is less obtrusive.
